pkgmetadata.longdescription: Digitization of Phytosociological Relevs // Simple and fast tool for transforming phytosociological vegetation data into digital form for the following analysis. Danihelka, Chrtek, and Kaplan (2012, ISSN:00327786). Hennekens, and Schamine (2001) doi:10.2307/3237010. Tich (2002) doi:10.1111/j.1654-1103.2002.tb02069.x. Wickham, Franois, Henry, Mller (2022) https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=dplyr.
